title: The 20YA | Full Event Preview
body_text:
I was just telling my boss how tomorrow's historic 20YA has been scheduled and planned for one full calendar. We work for the same company - Sunrise Senior Living - that hired me in 2011 as an memory care activities manager. Did you know that the Megill and Pellecchia families provided initial references way back when? 🧡
To me, "dodgeball" represents a major foundation of my adulthood: the social landscape exponentially expanded, fear of public speaking diminished, self-confidence grew, and the never-thought-possible occupational opportunities.
"Dodgeball" - all of you - greatly enhanced and enriched this guy's life and I can't think of a better way to celebrate our collectively created 20th anniversary. 🙂

We work for the same company - Sunrise Senior Living - that hired me in 2011 as an memory care activities manager. Did you know that the Megill and Pellecchia families provided initial references way back when? 🧡

To me, "dodgeball" represents a major foundation of my adulthood: the social landscape exponentially expanded, fear of public speaking diminished, self-confidence grew, and the never-thought-possible occupational opportunities.

"Dodgeball" - all of you - greatly enhanced and enriched this guy's life and I can't think of a better way to celebrate our collectively created 20th anniversary. 🙂
